job.title: Principal Software Engineer, Integration - Tableau
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongProducts and Technologystrong Job Details brbrstrongstrongstrongWho we arebrbrstrongstrongAt Tableau we are on a mission to help people see and understand data We create intuitive and powerful analytics software that enables thousands of leading organizations and millions of people around the world to find insights in their data The Augmented Analytics team is looking to advance us on this journey by putting the power of statistical analysis and machine learning within reach of anyone with a question about their databrbrWe are looking for an energetic and creative Principal Software Engineer to join our team and be part of our vision You will be part of a talented team of engineers who are dedicated to building a groundbreaking product in the Analytics space working in a fast paced and iterative environment If we are successful people will be able to make better decisions and optimize outcomes in industries from healthcare to manufacturing and agriculture to transportationbrbrstrongstrongSome of the things youll be doing includebrstrongstrongulli Building analytics software that is highly performant and reacts with low latency even on huge datasets lili Working across the Tableau C code base to integrate our standalone cloud software into Tableau products Occasionally diving into modules built with TypeScript and endtoend automation code using Java lili Working across teams to make sure we are building great experiences for customers while using new infrastructure and technologies lili Deploying and managing our server instance including upgrading database schema lili Helping product managers and designers iteratively create and refine their plans lili Working with the entire team in a collaborative environment where all suggestions are welcomed and all ideas thoughtfully considered brliulstrongstrongLets talk about youbrstrongstrongulli Youre Experienced You have professional experience writing code to build production software services and integrating different services together in Java C andor C lili Youre an Implementer Youre looking for a job where you can get hands on with the whole system while working with a diverse and capable team lili Youre Technical You know how to keep an EC2 instance up amp running how to tell when it fails and what to do about it lili Youre CustomerFocused You have opinions about how users will use the product and what problem they might run into Being interested and willing to dive into and understand customers problems is both helpful and rewarding lili Youre QualityFocused You write code thats welltested performs well and fails gracefully Experience dealing with large datasets in a highly performant way is a bonus lili Youre SelfMotivated You take initiative and can turn ideas into real features You enjoy discussing use cases amp user flows with product managers amp designers and contributing ideas to those discussions lili Youre Collaborative You enjoy collaborating with learning from and teaching others so we all can become better lili Youre Respectful You treat your colleagues with honesty kindness and respect and actively do your part to create a positive work environment lili Youre Humble You are unafraid to ask questions when you dont know the answer and you approach disagreements with the possibility that you might be wrong lili Youre A Recruiter Tableau hires company builders and you will be asked to be on constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world brliulstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefitsbrbruSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu will not pay any thirdparty agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with uSalesforcecomu or uSalesforceorgu brbrSalesforce welcomes all
